info.name: wenet-profile-manager
info.description: Examples to interact with the API that will be used to storing and maintaining the WeNet user profile.

query.description: The difference, measured in seconds, between the minimum time stamp when the profile was enabled and midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC
The difference, measured in seconds, between the maximum time stamp when the profile was enabled and midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC
The order in witch has to return the profiles. From the newest to the oldest (descendant '-') or from the oldest to the newest (ascendant '+').
Index of the first profile to return.
Number maximum of profiles to return.

request.description: Obtain all the changes that has bene done over a profile.

header.description: The preferred language for the text on the questionnaire. If it is not available the texts will be on English.

request.description: Obtain all the changes that has bene done over a profile.

query.description: Type of aggregation: RECENCY_BASED, MAXIMUM,MINIMUM, AVERAGE or MEDIAN
